column4: could anyone help me get my bluetooth mouse working again? It hasn't been working since the upgrade Jaunty Jackelope
have you re-installed the drivers for it?
i didn't know I had to. It was plug and play before.
redo what you did before, remove all that you did to connect to it before first
blutooth in general is really messed up on all linux,,,fresh setup is the only way ,,, if possible
just re-do all that has to do with bluetooth
i have no idea how to do that, and I'm afraid if I tried I may do irrevocable damage.
could you be more specific please? what do you mean by "look at"?
I cant afford to pay for another one of these mouses! Do you know how much these things cost???
i work for HP on the Linux QA testing team
but how would i know which BT packages to reinstall?
